data.message: WHOOOOOOO!!!!!! everybody in the game gets one rickflair from shady... i hope he's back to being antagonistic. can't wait to hear this new album

replies.message: Nah, you're getting a pop single ft. Sia.
SSLP had a pop hit but was dark, MMLP had pop hits and was dark. it can be done lol
Eminem show was even poppy and dark
I wanna hear it but not paying for it.. won't be worth it, guaranteed. Last decent one I heard was back in 2010

What ever happened to rappers collaborating with other rappers?? This sia, pink, Rihanna bullshit isnt what we want. I hope he is revived into a RAPPER again. Not a pop-heavy rapper. In a world full of mumble rappers the last thing we need is someone like eminem collaborating with pop stars. Did you see jay z have any gay pop collaborations? Not on his most recent album. I'm keeping my hopes up but am highly skeptical that this album will be any better than the last 3 ones. Hope I am proved wrong.
Me too, but I doubt it.

Oh, he's too mainstream
Well, that's what they do when they get jealous, they confuse it
It's not hip hop, it's pop, cause I found a hella way to fuse it
With rock, shock rap with Doc
Throw on Lose Yourself and make 'em lose it
I don't know how to make songs like that
I don't know what words to use
Let me know when it occurs to you
While I'm ripping any one of these verses diverse as you
